snippet: Once Douglas Shulman leaves the post on Nov. 9, Steven Miller, a 25-year veteran of the agency, will serve as acting commissioner until the president nominates a permanent successor.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service commissioner Douglas Shulman says he will step down Nov 9; Steven Miller will serve as acting commissioner until a permanent successor is sworn in.
lead_paragraph: Once Douglas Shulman leaves the post on Nov. 9, Steven Miller, a 25-year veteran of the agency, will serve as acting commissioner until the president nominates a permanent successor.

headline.seo: Douglas Shulman, Head of the Internal Revenue Service, to Step Down
headline.main: I.R.S. Commissioner Will Step Down in November
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Commissioner Will Step Down in November
